title: pAlaya shrI
sahitya:
pAlaya shrI panca nadEshvara mAm pAlaya dharmAmbikA manOhara


anupallavi

  bAla nEtra kamanIya gAtra parama pavitra saccaritra


caraNam    tApatryAnala vArivAha dAsa janArti jalada gandhavAha 
rUpa vijitAyuta madana janaukha mOkSanAtha tripurAsura samhAra
shrIpati venkaTEshvarOllAsa shrIkara rajatAdri ahika 
lApa sudhAkara kalAvatamsa lalita bhASa pOSitAkhila sumanasa
